EmailTemplate.description: New IAVA Member (did not self-ID as Vet or Supporter) - New Salesforce Contact - welcome e-mail
EmailTemplate.name: UPDATED: WelcomeEmail_LazyMember
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to IAVA! Tell us more!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome to IAVA! We’re over 400,000 members strong, and together we’re working to change our communities, and our country for the better. I’m glad you joined us!
To make sure we’re sending you the most relevant information about how to get involved with IAVA, please click on one of the choices below, to let us know if you are:
Pre-9/11 Veteran Post-9/11 Veteran Family Member of a Veteran Supporter
In the meantime, Follow us on social media to get up-to-the-minute info about what we’re working on. You can check us out on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
Thanks again for joining IAVA! - we’re glad you’re here
Onward!
Paul Rieckhoff Iraq Veteran Executive Director & Founder Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
